item.title: 零售商减值 1.55 亿美元，Pick n Pay 出现亏损
item.description: Pick n Pay Stores Ltd. 预计全年将出现亏损，因为这家南非第三大杂货商将对不盈利的商店进行 40 亿兰特（1.55 亿美元）的减值。【原文：Pick n Pay Stores Ltd. expects to report a full-year loss as South Africa’s third-biggest grocer takes a 4 billion-rand ($155 million) impairment on unprofitable stores.】

item.title: 特斯拉在欧洲的销量跌至 15 个月新低
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）第二季度在欧洲市场开局不利，该公司首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）原本预计欧洲市场的表现会比今年前几个月好得多。【原文：Tesla Inc. got off to a sluggish start to the second quarter in Europe, where Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk was expecting a much better showing than the first few months of the year.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国通胀放缓低于预期
item.description: 2024 年 5 月 20 日星期一，英国伦敦金斯顿区，一名购物者在市场摊位上挑选新鲜农产品。英国央行副行长本-布罗德本特（Ben Broadbent）表示，如果第二轮通胀压力如期下降，英国央行将能够在 "夏季的某个时候 "降息。摄影师：Jason Alden/Bloomberg【原文：A shopper selects fresh produce from a market stall in the Kingston district of London, UK, on Monday, May 20, 2024. The Bank of England will be able to cut interest rates “some time over the summer” if second round inflation pressures drop away as expected, Deputy Governor Ben Broadbent said. Photographer: Jason Alden/Bloomberg】

item.title: 日本 10 年期债券收益率达到密切关注的 1%水平
item.description: 日本 10 年期主权债券收益率达到了 1%的关键心理水平，这是自日本央行 2013 年加大史无前例的刺激措施以来首次达到这一水平，因为人们的焦点已转向如何快速回调政策。【原文：Japan’s 10-year sovereign bond yield reached a key psychological level of 1% for the first time since the Bank of Japan ramped up unprecedented stimulus measures in 2013, as the focus turns to how quickly the policy will be dialed back.】

item.title: 中国银行急于为国家购买未售出房屋提供贷款
item.description: 中国的大型银行正在敦促分行经理向购买未售出房屋的国有企业提供贷款，以迅速表明对上周公布的政府住房救助计划的支持。【原文：China’s mega banks are urging branch managers to lend to state-owned companies that buy unsold homes, offering a quick show of support for the government’s housing rescue package unveiled last week.】

item.title: 凯雷与 amicaa 签订协议，为燃油零售商收购提供 1.4 亿新西兰元贷款
item.description: 凯雷集团和澳大利亚私人信贷管理公司 amicaa 将提供 1.4 亿新西兰元（约合 8600 万美元）的贷款，为新西兰燃料零售商 NPD 公司首席执行官的管理层收购提供资金。【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. and amicaa, an Australian private credit manager, are providing a NZ$140 million ($86 million) loan to finance a management buyout of New Zealand fuel retailer NPD by the company’s chief executive officer.】

item.title: 澳大利亚第二大养老金公司将为私人信贷拨款数十亿美元
item.description: 澳大利亚退休信托基金（Australian Retirement Trust）是一家规模达 2,600 亿澳元（1,740 亿美元）的养老基金，该基金计划在来年增加其私人信贷配置，在欧洲和北美寻找机会。【原文：Australian Retirement Trust, the A$260 billion ($174 billion) pension fund, plans to boost its private credit allocation in the coming year, seeking opportunities in Europe and North America.】

item.title: 中国火锅连锁店在美国首秀表现出色后着眼于全球增长
item.description: 超嗨国际控股有限公司（Super Hi International Holding Ltd.）是中国广受欢迎的火锅连锁店 "海底捞 "的国际运营商。【原文：Super Hi International Holding Ltd., the international operator of China’s popular hot-pot chain Haidilao, is planning to boost its international footprint following a listing in the US that’s been well-received.】

item.title: 规模达 900 亿美元的基金称印度债券定价低于指数走势
item.description: ICICI Prudential Asset Management Co.称，市场尚未对印度被纳入全球债券指数进行适当定价。【原文：Markets have yet to appropriately price India’s inclusion into global bond indexes, according to ICICI Prudential Asset Management Co.】

item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The dollar may remain stronger for longer if the Federal Reserve keeps interest rates steady, while other nations opt for a reduction in borrowing costs, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 中国市场宽幅震荡的改善对股票多头来说是个好消息
item.description: 中国股市的反弹还将继续，因为涨势已蔓延到那些落后于市场复苏的板块。【原文：The rebound in Chinese stocks is set to extend as the gains spread to segments that have trailed the market recovery.】

item.title: 澳大利亚养老基金 Aware Super 的伦敦员工将增加一倍
item.description: 澳大利亚第三大养老基金 Aware Super 计划在其伦敦办事处增聘多达 15 名员工，以进一步深化私人市场投资。【原文：Aware Super plans to hire up to 15 more people in its London office as Australia’s third-largest pension fund pushes deeper into private markets investments.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利 "愤怒"，瑞士信贷 "软弱"，因 Archegos 下跌
item.description: 2021 年 3 月，当 Archegos 资本管理公司就迫在眉睫的追加保证金问题进行联系时，瑞士信贷采取了 "非常温和的语气"，而摩根士丹利则 "严厉得多，愤怒得多"。【原文：When Archegos Capital Management reached out about looming margin calls in March 2021, Credit Suisse took a “very soft tone,” while Morgan Stanley was “much harsher, angry.”】

item.title: 德意志银行预测中国-中东交易费用将激增
item.description: 中国企业进军中东的热潮促使德意志银行调整其地区结构，使中东地区的企业银行业务更贴近亚洲。【原文：A surge in Chinese companies expanding into the Middle East has spurred Deutsche Bank AG to adjust its regional structure and bring the Mideast corporate banking operations closer to Asia.】

item.title: 银行和私人信贷公司为收购 PowerSchool 提供资金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，私人信贷机构和银行正在争相为教育软件供应商 PowerSchool Holdings Inc.【原文：Private credit lenders and banks are competing to provide debt financing for a potential buyout of education software provider PowerSchool Holdings Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 调查期限临近，中国暗示将对美国和欧盟汽车征收 25% 的关税
item.description: 据一个游说团体称，随着世界第二大经济体与美国和欧盟之间的贸易紧张局势加剧，中国可能会对装有大型发动机的进口汽车征收高达 25% 的关税。【原文：China could unleash tariffs as high as 25% on imported cars with large engines, according to one lobby group, as trade tensions ramp up between the world’s No. 2 economy and the US and European Union.】

item.title: 纳米伊棉花公司敦促股东拒绝路易达孚收购案
item.description: Namoi 棉花有限公司正敦促其股东拒绝路易达孚公司的收购要约，称这家农产品贸易商对这家棉花生产商的最新收购要约并不公平合理。【原文：Namoi Cotton Ltd. is urging its shareholders to reject a takeover bid from Louis Dreyfus Co., saying the agricultural trader’s latest offer for the cotton producer isn’t fair and reasonable.】

item.title: 印度期待中央银行提供 120 亿美元红利，以帮助编制预算
item.description: 经济学家表示，印度央行预计将向联邦政府支付高达一万亿卢比（120 亿美元）的红利，此举将增加新德里的国库收入，并有助于实现其预算赤字目标。【原文：India’s central bank is expected to pay up to one trillion rupees ($12 billion) as dividend to the federal government, economists said, a move that would boost New Delhi’s coffers and help meet its budget deficit target.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好投资者为英伟达业绩做好准备。中国科技股更具吸引力。俄罗斯原油出口走高。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. Investors brace for Nvidia results. China tech stocks show more appeal. Russia’s crude exports edge higher. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 行业报告指出美国库存膨胀，石油价格下跌
item.description: 在一份行业报告指出美国原油库存增加后，原油跌幅扩大，这增加了市场的看跌迹象。【原文：Oil extended losses after an industry report pointed to rising US crude inventories, adding to bearish signs for the market.】

item.title: 美国创下新纪录，亚洲开盘谨慎：市场综述
item.description: 在巨型芯片制造商英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）发布被交易商视为牛市持续性衡量标准的财报之前，标准普尔500指数再创新高，亚洲股市开盘后表现平淡。【原文：Asia stocks look set for a muted open after the S&P 500 crept to another record ahead of results from giant chipmaker Nvidia Corp. that traders see as a gauge for the sustainability of the bull market.】

item.title: 首席财务官表示，在降息停滞不前的情况下，XP 将 "不太积极地 "增长
item.description: 巴西投资公司XP Inc.首席财务官布鲁诺-康斯坦丁诺（Bruno Constantino）周二表示，该公司预计其零售收入和净新增资金将继续增长，但 "增长势头 "不及预期。【原文：Brazilian investment firm XP Inc. expects its retail revenue and net new money to keep growing, but “at less aggressive” levels than expected, Chief Financial Officer Bruno Constantino said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 顶级基金因降息押注奇异果债券而非澳债
item.description: 一位绩优基金经理表示，由于新西兰央行可能很快开始降息，新西兰的国债看起来比澳大利亚的国债更有吸引力。【原文：New Zealand’s government debt is looking more appealing than its Australian counterpart as the nation’s central bank may start cutting rates soon, according to a top-performing fund manager.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的斯利蒙认为股市飙升将突破历史新高
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的安德鲁-斯利蒙（Andrew Slimmon）表示，即使在股市创下历史新高之际，投资者仍在紧握现金，这表明市场还有很大的空间来扩大涨幅。【原文：Investors are clinging to their cash even as stocks hit all-time highs, a sign that there’s plenty of room for the market to extend those gains, according to Morgan Stanley’s Andrew Slimmon.】

item.title: 伊朗总统之死如何动摇了对下任最高领袖的赌注
item.description: 伊朗总统易卜拉欣-莱西（Ebrahim Raisi）于 5 月 19 日在直升机坠毁事故中丧生，伊朗定于 6 月 28 日投票选举新政府首脑。拉伊西的去世或许对一个更重要职位的未来产生了更大的影响，因为他有望接替 84 岁的伊朗最高领袖阿亚图拉-阿里-哈梅内伊（Ayatollah Ali Khamenei），这是中东地区最有权力的职位之一。【原文：With the death of Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi in a helicopter crash May 19, the country is scheduled to elect a new head of government in voting June 28. Raisi’s death has perhaps greater consequences for the future of a more important post, in that he was expected to succeed Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, 84, Iran’s supreme leader, one of the most powerful positions in the Middle East.】

item.title: 债券交易员削减美联储降息押注，国债空头重现
item.description: 债券交易员们再次对美联储是否会实现上周刚刚在掉期曲线中定价的两次降息表示怀疑。【原文：Bond traders are once again growing doubtful that the Federal Reserve will deliver the two interest rate cuts that were priced into the swaps curve just last week.】

item.title: 红龙虾店主驳斥 "无尽虾 "交易指控
item.description: 红龙虾管理有限责任公司（Red Lobster Management LLC）旗下的泰国海鲜供应商对以下指控提出异议：红龙虾管理有限责任公司强迫现已破产的红龙虾公司接受其虾类，而前管理层则在其餐厅推广 "无休止 "的虾类交易。【原文：The Thai seafood supplier that owns Red Lobster Management LLC disputed allegations that it forced the now-bankrupt business to take its shrimp while former management promoted an “endless” shrimp deal at its restaurants.】

item.title: Martello Re 寻求至少 8 亿美元的新股本
item.description: 据知情人士透露，总部位于百慕大的人寿和年金再保险公司 Martello Re 正在洽谈筹集至少 8 亿美元的新股本。【原文：Martello Re, a Bermuda-based life and annuity reinsurance company, is in talks to raise at least $800 million of new equity, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】
